title: Child's play and the real world
creator_credit: Davidson Films, Sterling Educational Films and James M. Smith
brief_description: Examines the intimate, colorful and whimsical world of children at play. It dispels the impression that child’s play is merely an entertaining diversion into make-believe and shows how it forms an important part in the development of expression and imagination in children.
